sentence.Network_en: The fallibility of science is one of the great betrayals of our times.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学的不可靠是我们的时代最大的一种背叛。

sentence.Network_en: The recognition of fallibility is simply an acknowledgment of our humanity.
sentence.Network_cn: 承认人皆有错不过是正视人性而已.

sentence.Network_en: This idea stems from the acceptance of human fallibility and is supported by modern aesthetics.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样说,除了宽容人性的弱点外,还有现代美学的支持.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 他从人类知识的极限谈到当代艺术的演变发展,从古典经济学理论当中存在着的缺陷,谈到认知易错(fallibility)在逻辑思维当中的作用,在他探索的领域所涉及的问题当中,甚至.
但今天被接纳的代模，乃圣经有谬(fallibility)。」(Truth and Power, p.47)13.
factorable 可分解因子的fallibility 易错, 不可靠, 易误fallible 易错的, 可能犯错的

list.abs: pleasure is by means an infallible critical guide , but it is the least fallible .愉悦不是一贯正确的批评标准，但它却是最保险的。
Efficient market theory is highly fallible , but it may still be better than anything else ., 有效市场理论高度易错 , 但是比别的也许仍然好.
analysis on the fallibility point of conic圆锥曲线易错点分析
analysis on fallible problems in electric fire - extinguishing system design ., 电气消防系统设计易错问题剖析.

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is fallible, you mean that they are not perfect and are likely to make mistakes or to fail in what they are doing.

example.ex: They are only human and all too fallible...
example.tran: 他们只不过是普通人，太容易犯错误了。

example.ex: The system has proved fallible time after time...
example.tran: 时间一次又一次证明,这个系统是会出错的。

auth_sentence.content: We understand it, and its fallibility as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: We understand it, and its fallibility as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We understand it, and its fallibility as well.

auth_sentence.content: Capitalism thus mitigates both human greed and human fallibility.
auth_sentence.res_content: Capitalism thus mitigates both human greed and human fallibility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Capitalism thus mitigates both human greed and human fallibility.

auth_sentence.content: Nature, malice, and human fallibility can all defeat any design of man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nature, malice, and human fallibility can all defeat any design of man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nature, malice, and human fallibility can all defeat any design of man.
